name: UserLogonHistory
author: TheHive Development Team
description: Retrieves comprehensive user logon history analysis from Microsoft Sentinel via Azure Logic App. Provides 7-day authentication activity including sign-in counts, IP addresses, geographic locations, device information, MFA usage, risk assessment, and security recommendations for incident response and security investigations.

configurationItems.name: api_url
configurationItems.description: Base URL of the Azure Logic App endpoint WITHOUT the signature parameter. Example: https://your-app.azurewebsites.net/api/Get-User-Logon-History-Report/triggers/manual/invoke?api-version=2022-05-01&sp=%2Ftriggers%2Fmanual%2Frun&sv=1.0 (DO NOT include &sig= at the end)

configurationItems.name: api_signature
configurationItems.description: API signature key for authentication. This will be appended to the URL as &sig={value}. Example: 0tqj9J40Z18eMY3iokYkldM-RwlWoJrsae2fgEdaZm8

configurationItems.name: timeout
configurationItems.description: Request timeout in seconds (Logic App queries can take 30-90 seconds)

configurationItems.name: verify_ssl
configurationItems.description: Verify SSL certificates for HTTPS requests
